getLenderInterestData(address,address).return: interestPaid The total amount of interest that has been paid to a lender so far.interestPaidDate The date of the last interest pay out, or 0 if no interest has been withdrawn yet.interestOwedPerDay The amount of interest the lender is earning per day.interestUnPaid The total amount of interest the lender is owned and not yet withdrawn.interestFeePercent The fee retained by the protocol before interest is paid to the lender.principalTotal The total amount of outstanding principal the lender has loaned.

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.loanId: A unique ID representing the loan.

reduceLoanDuration(bytes32,address,uint2.return: secondsReduced The amount of time in seconds the loan is reduced.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.loanId: A unique ID representing the loan.

withdrawCollateral(bytes32,address,uint2.return: actualWithdrawAmount The amount withdrawn taking into account drawdowns.

depositCollateral(bytes32,uint256).notice: Increase the margin of a position by depositing additional collateral.

extendLoanDuration(bytes32,uint256,bool,.notice: Extend the loan duration by as much time as depositAmount can buy.

getLenderInterestData(address,address).notice: Get current lender interest data totals for all loans  with a specific oracle and interest token.

getLoan(bytes32).notice: Get one loan data structure by matching ID.     * Wrapper to internal _getLoan call.

getLoanInterestData(bytes32).notice: Get current interest data for a loan.

getLoanV2(bytes32).notice: Get one loan data structure by matching ID.     * Wrapper to internal _getLoan call.

getUserLoans(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Get all user loans.     * Only returns data for loans that are active.

getUserLoansV2(address,uint256,uint256,u.notice: Get all user loans.     * Only returns data for loans that are active.

initialize(address).notice: Set initial values of proxy targets.

reduceLoanDuration(bytes32,address,uint2.notice: Reduce the loan duration by withdrawing from the deposited interest.

withdrawCollateral(bytes32,address,uint2.notice: Withdraw from the collateral. This reduces the margin of a position.

userdoc.notice: This contract code comes from bZx. bZx is a protocol for tokenized margin trading and lending https://bzx.network similar to the dYdX protocol. * This contract contains functions to query loan data and to modify its status by withdrawing or depositing collateral.
